testimonials.description: This platform has been a game-changer for our international projects, making it easier to stay connected without the usual hassles.

testimonials.description: The ease of use and flexibility offered by this service has allowed us to focus on what matters most—our work!

testimonials.description: We've seen significant cost savings since switching to this eSIM solution. It's a smart choice for any business working globally.

product.name: Pocket Wifi
product.description: The Yoowifi Pocket Wifi device offers fast and reliable internet access wherever you go. Perfect for travelers and remote workers, it allows you to connect up to 8 devices simultaneously. Yoowifi provides a variety of data plans tailored to your needs, whether you're heading out for a weekend or traveling for an extended period. With coverage in multiple countries, it's the ideal travel companion.

tabs.title: Description
tabs.content: It is easy to use and boasts a sleek, minimalist design. Simply turn it on, connect your devices, and you’re good to go! No more worrying about complicated setup processes or bulky equipment. But that’s not all – our Pocket WiFi devices also offer strong and reliable connectivity, ensuring that you stay connected no matter where you are. Whether you’re on a business trip or a family vacation, you can enjoy high-speed internet without any interruptions.

tabs.title: Specifications
tabs.content:
CPU: SC8310LTE-FDD：Bands 1 / 2 / 3 / 4 / 5 / 7 / 8 / 12 / 13 / 17 / 18 / 20 / 25 / 26 /28 / 66
LTE-TDD：Bands 34 / 38 / 39 / 40 / 41 (194M)
WCDMA：Bands 1 / 2 / 4 / 5 / 8
TD-SCDMA：NO CDMA：NO
EVDO：NO
GSM：850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900
Max speed：Download 150Mbps / Upload 50Mbps
Wi-Fi：2.4GHz 802.11 b / g / n 1T1R
Max WiFi Connection：8
Battery：3000mAh
Ports：Type-C USB
Input：5V – 1A
Item size：120mm x 64.6mm x 12mm
Item weight：112g
Shell Material：Plastics

tabs.title: What's Included
tabs.content:
50GB global data is applicable to 90 countries.
Speed of service is dependent on the mobile network partner.
For order cancellation, a charge of 10% of the order will apply.
General terms and conditions apply.
Yoowifi reserved the rights to make changes anytime.

features.heading: Key Features
features.subHeading: Don't let slow internet tie you down! Switch to our portable solutions to experience connectivity without boundaries.

stayConnectedYourWay.heading: Stay Connected Your Way
stayConnectedYourWay.subHeading: Purchase or rent a device with flexibility to match your connectivity needs. Choose between owning a long-term solution or renting for short-term use, ensuring you have reliable access whenever you need it.

ways.title: Buy Your Own Device
ways.description: Purchase a device for long-term, reliable connectivity whenever you need it.

ways.title: Rental
ways.description: Access reliable connectivity when you need it with flexible, short-term device rental options—ideal for trips, events, or temporary use.

whatsIncluded.heading: What's Included
whatsIncluded.subHeading: Everything You Need for Seamless Connectivity

includedList.pressNote: Press the power button for 3 seconds

ledIndicators.subHeading: Keep Track of Your Device's Power Status Easily

howToConnect.heading: How to connect Pocketwifi?
howToConnect.subHeading: Effortlessly Connect to Your Pocket WiFi in Just a Few Simple Steps

steps.title: Turn On the Pocket WiFi
steps.description: Press the power button to turn it on and wait for it to connect to the network.

steps.title: Find the WiFi Name
steps.description: Check the device's screen for the WiFi network name (SSID).

steps.title: Connect to WiFi
steps.description: On your smartphone, tablet, or laptop, open WiFi settings, select the SSID, enter the password displayed on the device, and you will be connected to the internet.

howToReturn.heading: How to Return Device?
howToReturn.subHeading: Follow our easy steps to ensure a hassle-free return experience.

cardData.title: Singpost Drop-Off
cardData.description: When you rent the device, a pre-paid return label will be included in the package. You can use this label to easily mail the device back. After returning it, you’ll likely receive an email confirmation once the return is processed.

cardData.title: Pickup Drop off Locations
cardData.description: With Yoowifi, you can effortlessly pick up your device at any of our designated locations and return it at one of our 30+ convenient drop-off points across the island. This streamlined process guarantees a hassle-free experience, allowing you to stay connected wherever your travels take you!

planTopUp.heading: How to do a plan Top up
planTopUp.subHeading: Easily Manage Your Data Needs with Yoowifi Top-Up

steps.title: Select Your Device
steps.description: Open the Yoowifi app, go to My Data, and select the device you want to top up.

steps.title: Choose Your Plan
steps.description: Click on Add Data, select your desired country and plan, then set the start and end dates.

steps.title: Proceed to Checkout
steps.description: Confirm your selections and proceed to checkout.

product.name: Router
product.description: The Yoowifi Router offers seamless and reliable internet connectivity at home or in the office. With advanced features and high-speed connectivity, it ensures that you stay connected without any interruptions. The router is easy to set up and use, making it the perfect solution for all your internet needs.

tabs.title: Description
tabs.content: It is easy to use and boasts a sleek, minimalist design. Simply turn it on, connect your devices, and you’re good to go! No more worrying about complicated setup processes or bulky equipment. But that’s not all – our Pocket WiFi devices also offer strong and reliable connectivity, ensuring that you stay connected no matter where you are. Whether you’re on a business trip or a family vacation, you can enjoy high-speed internet without any interruptions.

howToConnectRouter.heading: How to connect Router?
howToConnectRouter.subHeading: Step-by-step guide to easily set up your eSIM
steps: Connect the power adapter to the WiFi router and plug it into the power socket. Then, turn on the power socket.
To connect to your WiFi network, locate the default WiFi name and password on the underside / back of the WiFi Router.
Connect to the default WiFi name and enter the password when prompted, and you're all set!

product.name: SIM/eSIM
product.description: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typeset industry.Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry.Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry.

tabs.title: Description
tabs.content: Our Sim/E-Sim is perfect for those who value convenience and ease of use. You can activate it within minutes and start enjoying all the benefits that come with it. Whether you’re a student, a working professional, or anyone who needs a reliable telecommunications service, our Sim/E-Sim is the perfect solution for you. We offer competitive pricing, flexible plans, and excellent customer support to ensure that you get the best value for your money!

tabs.title: Terms & Conditions
tabs.content:
One-time use physical SIM card expiry date would be 60 days after purchase
 No refunds or cancellations can be made for eSIM due to eSIM compatibility issues.
 Do not delete or remove your eSIM from your device after successful installation.
 General terms and conditions apply.

features.heading: Key Features
features.subHeading: Don't let slow internet tie you down! Switch to our portable solutions to experience connectivity without boundaries.

howToSetup.heading: How to Set Up Your SIM
howToSetup.subHeading: Don't let slow internet tie you down! Switch to our portable solutions to experience connectivity without boundaries.

steps.title: Purchase A SIM Card
steps.description: Easily order a SIM card via the Yoowifi app, and enjoy the convenience of having it delivered right to your doorstep.

steps.title: Insert SIM Card
steps.description: Insert SIM card and power on your mobile device.*Data validity starts immediately upon the first insertion of SIM at destination.

steps.title: Enable Data Roaming
steps.description: Enable Data Roaming on your mobile device.*If your phone is unable to detect the Data Roaming activation, reboot after step 2 and kindly ensure your Data Roaming is switch on.

activateSteps.heading: Easy Steps to Activate Your eSIM

deviceSteps.title: Step 1
deviceSteps.description: Activating your eSIM on the Yoowifi app
steps: After purchasing the eSIM, go to My Orders and click the Activate eSIM button to complete the activation.
Once activated, the eSIM will appear under My Data.

deviceSteps.title: Step 2
steps: Go to your iPhone’s settings. Tap on Cellular or Mobile Data.
Tap on Add eSIM
Tap on Use QR Code
Scan the QR code you received after purchasing the eSIM in the Yoowifi app or enter Details manually.

deviceSteps.title: Step 3
steps: If you're setting up manually, you may need to enter the activation details provided in the Yoowifi app under your eSIM order, which can be found in My Data.
Continue to activate eSIM.
Select the eSIM that has been added once you reach your travel destination, then enable Data Roaming to connect.

deviceSteps.title: Step 1
deviceSteps.description: Activating your eSIM on the Yoowifi app
steps: After purchasing the eSIM, go to My Orders and click the Activate eSIM button to complete the activation.
Once activated, the eSIM will appear under My Data.

deviceSteps.title: Step 2
steps: Go to your iPhone’s settings. Tap on Cellular or Mobile Data.
Tap on Add eSIM
Tap on Use QR Code
Scan the QR code you received after purchasing the eSIM in the Yoowifi app or enter Details manually.

deviceSteps.title: Step 3
steps: If you're setting up manually, you may need to enter the activation details provided in the Yoowifi app under your eSIM order, which can be found in My Data.
Continue to activate eSIM.
Select the eSIM that has been added once you reach your travel destination, then enable Data Roaming to connect.

howToTopUp.heading: How to Top up SIM/eSIM
howToTopUp.subHeading: 3 Simple Steps to Top Up Your SIM/eSIM

steps.title: Open the Yoowifi App
steps.description: In the Yoowifi app, navigate to My Data and select the SIM or eSIM you want to top up.

steps.title: Add Data
steps.description: Tap on Add Data, then choose your destination country, plan, data size, and select number of days.

steps.title: Proceed to Checkout
steps.description: Confirm your selections and proceed to checkout.

recommendedPackages.heading: Recommended Packages
recommendedPackages.subHeading: Discover Our Recommended Packages for Your Needs

packageList.title: Basic Package
packageList.information: This package provides basic internet connectivity, ideal for travelers or light internet users.

packageList.title: Traveler Package
packageList.information: Perfect for frequent travelers, this package supports global internet connectivity.

packageList.title: Extended Package
packageList.information: Extends the features of the standard package, offering longer usage periods or additional data options.

packageList.title: Unlimited Package
packageList.information: Offers unlimited data for worry-free internet usage.

packageList.title: Light Package
packageList.information: A package designed for light users or short-term usage.

packageList.title: Business Package
packageList.information: Tailored for business users on the move or frequent travelers for work.

packageList.title: Premium Package
packageList.information: Provides a premium connectivity experience with unlimited data in selected countries.

packageList.title: Family Package
packageList.information: A family-oriented package allowing multiple devices to connect simultaneously.

packageList.title: Traveler Plus Package
packageList.information: An ideal option for travelers requiring more data capacity.

packageList.title: Global Unlimited Package
packageList.information: The ultimate package offering unlimited data across the globe.
